org.net4care.testdoubles

Class LocalSynchroneousCallConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.net4care.testdoubles.LocalSynchroneousCallConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerConnector

    public class LocalSynchroneousCallConnector
extends Object
implements ServerConnector
    A ServerConnector implementation that is not distributed but simply makes local method calls to a provided ObservationReceiver instance. Use this for fast and easy JUnit testing, see several uses in the 'scenario' package.
    Author:
    Henrik Baerbak Christensen, Aarhus University

        Description copied from interface: ServerConnector
        Send the on-the-wire string to the server side.
        Specified by:
        sendToServer in interface ServerConnector
        Parameters:
        onTheWireFormat - the observation in the adopted on-the-wire format.
        Returns:

      • queryToServer

        public FutureResultWithAnswer queryToServer(Query query)
                                     throws Net4CareException,
                                            IOException
        Description copied from interface: ServerConnector
        Send a query for a set of observations to the server.
        Specified by:
        queryToServer in interface ServerConnector
        Parameters:
        query - the query for observations. Use one of those defined in the forwarder.query sub package as these are the ONLY ones the server understands.
        Returns:
        a future with the query result as one big string that needs deserializing before it can by understood.
        Throws:
        Net4CareException
        IOException
